column4: Is it possible to install ubuntu on a USB flash drive and use that on a computer that has no HDD ?  I installed ubuntu using unetbootin (chosen ubuntu netinstall) but now I am at the point it is asking me which partition to choose. I am lost at that point
if when you set it up you allowed it to create a persistence area then you should click the try ubuntu now button rather than the install ubuntu now button
then I should choose the Live instead of NetInstall version
oh, right yes. Or do a netinstall to a separate USB, I doubt installing to the one you booted from would be a good plan!
